channel.title: Blogs on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: sweetness...
item.description: give it to me.. give it to me yea.. its my weakness.. so today is the first day in a fair number of days that I am not coked out of my mind on sudafed. I decided to just brave it out. also.. the ricola was cutting the hell out of my mouth. I guess I suck too much. hahaha. anyway.. yea. so a bunch of journalists have been fired for having blogs.
